title: Bunraku: puppet theatre of Japan
creator_credit: Nichiei Kagaku Eiga Productions and Sakura Motion Pictures
brief_description: Traditional performances at the Bunraku-za Theatre, Osaka, show the style of this unusual 18th century form, still popular in Japan. The Bunraku dolls, half life-size, create a make-believe world peculiar to Japan, and are so delicate that they cannot be imitated by live actors.
